title: Mademoiselle le Sleuth
description: This delightful tale of a quirky American actress in Paris and her adorable 4 /12-year-old niece, who fancies herself a detective, melds comedy with chaos as the two entangle their ex-pat friends in the latest Sarah Bernhardt backstage murder. A stalker has his sights on the two, enticing the child with a red slicker that morphs her into a grim Red Riding Hood.The novel is etched in the vibrant colors of Paris streets and neighborhoods. From the Skeleton Museum to the zoo and carousel of extinct animals in the Jardin des Plantes, young Miranda and her aunt take readers on a thrilling romp through every touristâ€™s favorite city.
author: Theasa Tuohy
